lead_paragraph: KAUFMAN--Robert. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Robert Kaufman, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Robert's beloved wife, Florence; his daughters, Ronna, Cathy, and Julie; his sons-in-law, Mark and Gordon; his grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
